p: In the case of the content of such compounds as isorhamnetin, catechin, rutin, quercetin in the extracts, increased amounts were observed for the June harvest. The method of drying influenced the content of isorhamnetin and rutin. In the case of isorhamnetin, the content of this polyphenol was higher in the samples of extracts obtained from leaves dried at 35 Â°C, in the case of rutins, the opposite was true. The greater amount of rutin was found in the samples obtained from the leaves after natural drying.
